privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Dessi AI - Protecting Your Privacy
privacy.description: Learn how Dessi AI collects, uses, and protects your personal information. We are committed to protecting your privacy, all uploaded images are automatically deleted after 24 hours, and no data is shared with third parties.
privacy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, AI image processing, personal information security, GDPR compliance, data deletion, privacy protection

about.title: About Us | Dessi AI - Advanced AI Image Processing Technology
about.description: Learn about Dessi AI's mission, technical advantages, and team. We are committed to developing cutting-edge AI image processing technology to provide users with safe and efficient AI services.
about.keywords: AI image processing, artificial intelligence technology, deep learning, image recognition, AI services, technical team, innovative technology

terms.title: Terms of Service | Dessi AI - Terms and Conditions
terms.description: Learn about the terms and conditions for using Dessi AI services. Including user responsibilities, service limitations, intellectual property and other important legal terms.

contact.title: Contact Us | Dessi AI - Get Help and Support
contact.description: Contact the Dessi AI team for technical support, business inquiries, or feedback. We provide 24/7 online support with quick response to your needs.
contact.keywords: contact us, technical support, customer service, feedback, business inquiries, online support, help center

hero.title: AI Undress Technology
hero.subtitle: Advanced AI technology for fast image processing
hero.adDescription: Your ad content can be placed here

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.description: Select the image you want to process
upload.processingNote: Using AI technology to process your image...

items.a1: AI undress is a tool that uses artificial intelligence to digitally remove clothing from people in images or videos. It employs techniques such as image inpainting algorithms to analyze and manipulate visual data, effectively creating the illusion of undressed subjects.
items.a2: Simply upload a photo and then select the clothing areas you want to remove. The more accurately you mark, the better the results.
items.q3: How long does the generation process take?
items.a3: It depends on server load, so anywhere from one second to one minute.
items.q4: Can I use AI undress for free?
items.a4: Yes, you can use our generator for free with no request limits.
items.a5: The safety of AI undress depends on the user's intent. Such tools should be used responsibly, avoiding any harmful purposes. Always obtain explicit consent before manipulating images and use them only for artistic, educational, and non-commercial purposes.
items.a6: All uploaded files are automatically deleted after 24 hours, and generated content is kept for a maximum of 30 days.
items.q7: Are these generation results publicly accessible?
items.a7: No, your generation results are only available to you and are not shared with third parties.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide when using our AI image processing services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring your personal information is handled securely.

dataCollection.title: Information Collection
dataCollection.description: We may collect the following types of information:

items.uploaded: Uploaded image files (for processing purposes only)
items.technical: Technical information (IP address, browser type, device information)

dataUsage.title: Information Usage
dataUsage.description: We use the collected information for:

items.processing: Processing your uploaded images and providing AI services
items.improvement: Improving our service quality and user experience
items.support: Providing technical support and customer service
items.security: Maintaining service security and preventing abuse

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We take the following measures to protect your data:

items.encryption: All data transmission uses SSL/TLS encryption
items.autoDelete: Uploaded images are automatically deleted after 24 hours
items.accessControl: Strict access control and permission management

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy:
dataSharing.noSharing: We do not share, sell, or disclose your personal information and uploaded images to any third parties.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience:

items.essential: Essential cookies: Ensure the website functions properly
items.analytics: Analytics cookies: Help us understand website usage
items.preferences: Preference cookies: Remember your language and setting preferences

items.access: Right to access: View information we collect about you
items.correction: Right to correction: Correct inaccurate personal information
items.deletion: Right to deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
items.objection: Right to objection: Object to processing of your personal information

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or need to exercise your rights, please contact us:

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any significant changes will be posted on the website. Continued use of our services indicates your agreement to the updated policy.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Dessi AI services, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Dessi AI provides artificial intelligence-based image processing services, including but not limited to image editing, content generation, and image analysis functions.

items.processing: AI image processing and editing services

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: When using our services, you agree to:

items.lawful: Use the service only for lawful purposes
items.consent: Ensure you have the right to upload and process images
items.respect: Respect the privacy and rights of others
items.noHarm: Not use the service for harmful or malicious activities
items.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

prohibitedUse.title: Prohibited Use
prohibitedUse.description: You may not use our services for:

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: Our services and related technologies are protected by intellectual property laws:

items.ownership: Dessi AI owns all rights and ownership of the service
items.license: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive license to use
items.userContent: You retain ownership of uploaded content but grant us processing rights
items.generated: Ownership of AI-generated content is determined according to applicable law

items.uptime: We strive to maintain high service availability but do not guarantee 100% uptime
items.maintenance: We may perform regular maintenance and updates
items.interruption: Service may be temporarily interrupted due to technical issues
items.modification: We reserve the right to modify or terminate services

dataAndPrivacy.title: Data and Privacy
dataAndPrivacy.description: Your data processing is governed by our Privacy Policy:

items.processing: We process your data only to provide services
items.retention: Uploaded images are automatically deleted after 24 hours
items.security: We take reasonable measures to protect your data
items.sharing: We do not share your personal data with third parties

dataAndPrivacy.privacyNote: For detailed data processing information, please refer to our

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law:

items.asIs: Services are provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties
items.damages: We are not liable for any indirect, special, or consequential damages
items.liability: Our total liability is limited to the fees you paid to us
items.force: We are not liable for losses caused by force majeure events

items.userTermination: You may stop using our services at any time
items.ourTermination: We may terminate your access for violating terms
items.effect: Upon termination, your usage rights will immediately cease
items.survival: Certain terms remain effective after termination

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.description: These terms are governed by the following laws:

items.jurisdiction: This agreement is governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China
items.disputes: Any disputes should be resolved through friendly negotiation
items.court: If negotiation fails, disputes should be submitted to a court with jurisdiction
items.language: The Chinese version of this agreement is the authoritative version
